title: Remove remaining Smart Janghai branding text and rely on logo-only branding

requirements.text: Remove any visible “SMART JANGHAI” / “Smart Janghai” branding text from the UI so the site branding is logo-only (no brand-name text shown in the hero branding area or footer).
acceptanceCriteria: The hero branding area does not display any brand-name text (only the logo image is shown).
The footer does not display the brand name text (e.g., remove/replace the “© {year} Smart Janghai. All rights reserved.” wording so it no longer contains the brand name).
No other new user-facing text is introduced as a substitute for the removed brand-name text.

requirements.text: Update the BrandLogo component so that if the logo image fails to load, it does not fall back to showing the brand-name text; instead render a non-text fallback that preserves layout and does not cause a blank/empty page.
acceptanceCriteria: If the logo image path is invalid or the image fails to load, the component renders a simple non-text placeholder (e.g., a neutral shape/container) and the page remains fully rendered.
The fallback does not contain “SMART JANGHAI” or “Smart Janghai” text.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/components/ui).
Keep the existing resilient image-loading approach so missing assets never cause a blank section or blank page.
nonGoals: Do not change the hero background image asset or its path.
Do not redesign the overall homepage layout or rewrite non-branding informational copy beyond removing brand-name text.
